msg: Around 2001-2004, Thai gov supported the development of Thai <http://OpenOffice.org|OpenOffice.org> (two branches, Pladao Office and Office TLE) (I was part of Pladao team back then, as a Sun employee). But they more focused on the software and compatibility with MS Office file format. Not much discussion about open file format. Pladao discountinued after the Oracle aquisition. Same for Office TLE.
slackbot4's url: [Apache OpenOffice - Official Site - The Free and Open Productivity Suite]
Last year WPS did talked to Thai gov
